title: Collect Charge Declaration
description: Charge Declaration definition based on IATA electronic Air Waybill.

destinationCurrencyConvertionRate.title: Currency Conversion Rate
destinationCurrencyConvertionRate.description: The destination currency code followed by the conversion rate shall be inserted. Box 33A.

destinationCollectChargesCurrency.title: Collect Charges in Destination Currency
destinationCollectChargesCurrency.description: The amount shown in the “Total Collect” box shall be inserted after conversion to the destination currency. Box 33B.

destinationCharges.title: Charges at Destination
destinationCharges.description: Charges levied at destination accruing to the last carrier shall be inserted in destination currency. Box 33C.
